channel.title: Moving the Npcs Direction
channel.description:
Ok here is one thing i have never been able to work out... how the hell do you change where the npc is looking. Im looking on how to do it on a 317 Delta Base. I checked search and never found it. So if anyone can tell me how to that would be great. Here the peice of auto spawn just to give you an example.
[code]spawn = 3788 2660 2648 0 0 0 0 0 1[/code] WHICH ONE IS IT TO ROTATE IT!
